sentence.text: We previously identified a negative regulation of transcription, DNA-templated of the most frequently mutated cytoskeleton- and extracellular matrix-related proteins (CECMPs) in numerous cancer datasets.

In this report, we used a bioinformatics approach to assess the negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II of amino acid (AA) substitutions on the sensitivity of CECMPs to the ST14 protease (matriptase I), a transmembrane serine protease previously implicated in cancer development.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
